attributes.action: Take control of "Child Protection Services" in the Borough of Haringay, London, and make social services accountable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many children have to die in brutal ways for something to be done about the lack of care and accountability in the borough of Haringay?  Please stop Ed Balls undertaking another fob-you-off "review" of childcare (lack of) in this borough.  The horrific death of Victoria Climbie should have been enough for action to have been taken. Please Government stop fobbing people off and TAKE ACTION!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
